char_info.desc: The Maiden Who Converts Determination to Strength

a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: I see something on the other side of the Divide... And there seems to be a person who is guarding the place...

a1.speaker: Reimu:
a1.dialogue: Hmm... Is this the concert that mysteriously appeared along with the storm that buffeted Gensokyo?

a2.speaker: Emiri:
a2.dialogue: Why, young maiden, indeed it is!

a3.speaker: Emiri:
a3.dialogue: This is the Stage of Tonitrus, the venue of the Grand Performance by the Heaven-sent Lady Narukami!

a4.speaker: Emiri:
a4.dialogue: She will certainly bring light to the darkness of this secluded area.

a5.speaker: Emiri:
a5.dialogue: It has been in the darkness of fear for a long time until now!

a6.speaker: Reimu:
a6.dialogue: We don't need people like whoever you called 'Lady Narukami' to cheer the people of Gensokyo up.

a7.speaker: Reimu:
a7.dialogue: We already have the Choujou Gigaku and the Prismrivers to entertain its denizens.

a8.speaker: Emiri:
a8.dialogue: Ohoho! These bands are inferior to Milady. She is a person sent by God to bring happiness to mankind.

a9.speaker: Emiri:
a9.dialogue: Those people are just pagans tempted by false prophets to impersonate virtuous people.

a10.speaker: Reimu:
a10.dialogue: Then why didn't you shut up about this? I am going to smack you black and blue if you keep boasting about your mistress!

a11.speaker: Emiri:
a11.dialogue: Your heart is as dark as those who murdered my dearest cousin... Your actions have treaded my broken heart...

a12.speaker: Reimu:
a12.dialogue: Please, don't use your sob story to trick me to forfeit! I will never give up!

a13.speaker: Emiri:
a13.dialogue: I heard you are a murderer of supernatural beings, right? Well, I won't let you do that!

a14.speaker: Emiri:
a14.dialogue: I, Emiri Kanazaki of the Narukamite Alumnus, will vanquish you before you get a chance to disrupt her concert!
